short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Evaluates items on the Path of Exile trade site

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
POE Trade Evaluator adds instant item analysis to the Path of Exile trade site.

Features:
• Automatic scoring and highlighting of valuable items
• Detailed mod and synergy breakdowns
• Price-to-value comparisons
• Customizable interface
• No external tools required

Works directly on pathofexile.com/trade
Not affiliated with Grinding Gear Games.
